description: Commands to manage Dapr. To manage Dapr components, see `az containerapp env dapr-component`.

commands.name: az containerapp dapr disable
commands.summary: Disable Dapr for a container app. Removes existing values.
examples: az containerapp dapr disable -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az containerapp dapr enable
commands.summary: Enable Dapr for a container app. Updates existing values.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp dapr enable [--dal]
                            [--dapr-app-id]
                            [--dapr-app-port]
                            [--dapr-app-protocol {grpc, http}]
                            [--dapr-http-max-request-size]
                            [--dapr-http-read-buffer-size]
                            [--dapr-log-level {debug, error, info, warn}]
                            [--ids]
                            [--name]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
examples: az containerapp dapr enable -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --dapr-app-id my-app-id --dapr-app-port 8080
